Text:
Since you are using ALAC, I assume you're using a Mac.

I recommend using XLD, X-Lossless Decoder for ripping CDs, which provides a rip log and AccurateRip support.

The ALAC is for people who might want to have these on their iPods, etc.

Why do people want a log, though? Just to make sure I'm not turning 128kbps mp3s into FLAC files?
